thread.title: Ex-Jets CB Darrelle Revis cleared of charges stemming from street fight
thread.title_full: Ex-Jets CB Darrelle Revis cleared of charges stemming from street fight

title: Ex-Jets CB Darrelle Revis cleared of charges stemming from street fight
text:
Mar 15, 2017 at 3:08p ET 0Shares 
The judge hearing Darrelle Revis’ case stemming from a physical altercation in Pittsburgh last month has ruled in the former Jets cornerback’s favor, dismissing all charges. The ruling came down on Wednesday, per NFL Network . 
Revis, 31, was charged with aggravated assault and robbery in what was believed to be a street fight in the South Side on Feb. 12. The altercation left two men unconscious, though his attorney said “he did not punch two individuals.” 
The Jets announced they would release Revis at the start of the new league year just two weeks after the incident occurred. He has not been signed by another team and there has not been any reported interest in the seven-time Pro Bowl cornerback. 0
